info.author: Daniele Mazzocchio
info.description:
stdiff (Spot The Difference) is a file integrity checker. It aims to support 
system administrators in detecting signs of intrusions by tracking changes to 
the filesystem. It is OS independent, easy to use and fast. It supports most 
of the open-source databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite and dbm).
info.name: stdiff
info.html_description: stdiff (Spot The Difference) is a file integrity checker. It aims to support system administrators in detecting signs of intrusions by tracking changes to the filesystem. It is OS independent, easy to use and fast. It supports most of the open-source databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite and dbm).
